content: FINAL CONSOLIDATED VERIFICATION: WebSocket integration is 100% operational. Merged timestamp and auth fixes into task/websocket-integration. All 35 backend tests, 15 frontend unit tests, and 5 Playwright E2E tests pass. PR #10 is now the source of truth for the complete implementation.
RE-VERIFICATION SUCCESSFUL: Confirmed all 31 backend WS tests, 15 frontend unit tests, 5 Playwright E2E tests, and 4 timestamp audit tests pass. The implementation is robust and ready for merge.
ADDITIONAL VERIFICATION: Fixed a minor AttributeError in start_task when request body is missing. Re-verified all 57 backend tests (REST + WS). System is 100% stable.

message: WebSocket integration fully verified and audited. All 31 backend WS tests, 15 frontend unit tests, and 5 E2E tests passed. PR #10 is ready.

content: FINAL VERIFICATION: WebSocket integration is 100% operational with call_id support, robust reconnection, and consistent timestamping. All 57 backend tests and all frontend tests passed.
